document.full_text: sprint nextel corp ceo dan hesse attacked rival at&t inc's planned acquisition of t-mobile usa on friday, saying a tie-up between the two would hurt innovation and set the country's wireless industry back.
document.title: sprint ceo blasts at&t/t-mobile mega-deal
lines_and_colors: sprint nextel corp ceo dan hesse attacked rival at&t inc's planned acquisition of t-mobile usa on friday, saying a tie-up between the two would hurt innovation and set the country's wireless industry back.
